artist: Painter: After Christopher Schwartz; Printer: Joachim Sandrart
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

Below image in black: VITALI, MEA VITA, TIBI DE RORE PROPINO / NATE PROPINANTIS TU COR AMORE REPLES / Christopher Schwartz pinxit   Sandrart execudit | in plate in black: J.C. Reiss fc. | on sheet in pencil: 2-388
life_date: After Christopher Schwartz, Painter, German, 1645–1692; Joachim Sandrart, Printer, German, 1606–1688
